pages.heading: Plunderer's Glint
pages.text: Increases the drops from killed mobs. Also stacks with the Looting enchantment.$(br2)Valid items: Tools, Swords.$(br2)Applies: Plundering I (256 hits)

pages.heading: Plunderer's Glint L
pages.text: This upgraded version of the anointment lasts four times longer. $(br2)Applies: Plundering I (1024 hits)

pages.heading: Plunderer's Glint II
pages.text: This upgraded version of the anointment further increases the drops from killed mobs. $(br2)Applies: Plundering II (256 hits)

pages.heading: Plunderer's Glint XL
pages.text: This upgraded version of the anointment lasts sixteen times longer. $(br2)Applies: Plundering I (4096 hits)

pages.heading: Plunderer's Glint III
pages.text: This upgraded version of the anointment further increases the drops from killed mobs. $(br2)Applies: Plundering III (256 hits)
